title: Just had to lane vs a brand mf lane.
body:
brand rushed fqc and both had thunderlords.

Its like playing against everything thats wrong with bot lane/the game at once (except the broken tanks), holy shit i think i would rather dodge than to lane against this.

Love playing caitlyn the ''lane bully'' and be forced to tower hug or lose 100% of my hp in 1 trade/stun.
